name: easy-draganddrop
author: James Smith
description: Drag and drop elements including a file explorer and a rubbish bin.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run browserify
scripts.build-debug: npm run clean && npm run babel-debug && npm run browserify-debug
scripts.watch: npm run build && chokidar './index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build'
scripts.watch-debug: npm run build-debug && chokidar './index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build-debug'
